title: G2: Dev-Rel WG October Compensation Proposal
body:
What’s up everyone?! This is my October (October 1, 2021 →  October 31, 2021) compensation proposal:

 October 1, 2021 →  October 13, 2021 Supported developers hacking on the Rarible Protocol during ETHGlobal ETHOnline 2021.

Assisted @eric with judging and choosing ETHOnline 2021 winner (ColorPixels) from the list of Rarible Protocol entrants during the hackathon.

Compiled a list of developer leads consisting of projects focused around NFTs for consideration to covert via Biz-Dev WG.

Created ideas for hackers to build at hackathons

Attended all weekly Developer Relations Calls, DAO Sync-Ups, DAO-Wide Community Calls, Builders and App Q&A meetings.

Supported high-priority projects Daohaus and ScreenSaverWorld with their Rarible Protocol Issues.

Interacted via 1:1 Zoom meetings with new Rarible Protocol Members: @McBain and @bvalosek.

Contributed to writing Support Engineering Processes Improvements Proposal

Total Compensation
Time commitment: 147.53 hours
Amount: $8,511 at ($57.69/hr) in DAI / per my discussion with @eric and @McBain
Gnosis Safe: Dev
Wallet Address: 0x1Fde40a4046Eda0cA0539Dd6c77ABF8933B94260
author: 0x1Fde40a4046Eda0cA0539Dd6c77ABF8933B94260
